    Dr. Felipe Isaule

    Postdoctoral researcher
    Universitat de Barcelona

    • Barcelona, Spain

    Talks & Posters

    Selected Talks

    • 05/11/2020, Functional renormalization for Bose-Bose mixtures, at ERG2020 Conference, Online/Kyoto (Japan).
    • 12/03/2020, Cold atom gases from functional Renormalization, ICCUB seminar, Barcelona (Spain).
    • 25/07/2019, Cold quantum gases from functional Renormalisation, at Ab initio nuclear theory workshop, University of Surrey, Guildford (UK).
    • 05/04/2019, Functional renormalisation group for Bose gases: From linear to hydrodynamic fluctuations, at EMMI Workshop Functional Methods in Strongly Correlated Systems, Hirschegg (Austria).
    • 01/11/2018, Application of the functional renormalisation group to Bose gases, at 7th UK Nuclear Theory Meeting, The University of Manchester, Manchester (UK).
    • 03/06/2016, Materia nuclear y la ecuación de estado de estrellas de neutrones, Seminario DFI-UChile, Santiago (Chile).

    Posters

    • 14/12/2020, Functional renormalization for Bose-Bose mixtures (as a short talk), at Exploring Quantum Many‐Body Physics with Ultracold Atoms and Molecules, Online/Bad Honnef (Germany).
    • 9-11/12/2020, From linear to hydrodynamic fluctuations, at ERG2018 Conference, Paris (France).
    • 26-27/12/2014, Structure and cooling of neutron stars: nuclear pairing and superfluid effects, at XIX Chilean Physics Symposium, Concepción (Chile).
